sys_script_include.name: AuthorService

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_abfbf76093be8210ef267c5efaba10fb
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_1383151_bkquest.AuthorService</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>AuthorService</name><script><![CDATA[var AuthorService = Class.create();
AuthorService.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    getAuthors: function() {
        var authors = new global.GlideQuery('x_1383151_bkquest_author')
            .select(['full_name', 'date_of_birth', 'gender', 'nationality', 'books_written', 'author_image'])
            .map(function(author) {
                return {
                    full_name: author.full_name,
                    date_of_birth: author.date_of_birth,
                    gender: author.gender,
                    nationality: author.nationality,
                    books_written: author.books_written,
                    author_image: author.author_image ? '/sys_attachment.do?sys_id=' + author.author_image : ''
                };
            })
            .reduce(function(arr, author) {
                arr.push(author);
                return arr;
            }, []);

        return authors;
    },

    type: 'AuthorService'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>harini.srija</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-12 04:59:24</sys_created_on><sys_id>abfbf76093be8210ef267c5efaba10fb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>25</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AuthorService</sys_name><sys_package display_value="BookQuest" source="x_1383151_bkquest">327b26db93250210ef267c5efaba100f</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="BookQuest">327b26db93250210ef267c5efaba100f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_abfbf76093be8210ef267c5efaba10fb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>harini.srija</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-19 04:32:00</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
